00013         public UnixSocket(Int32 socket)
00014         {
00015             mSocket = socket;
00016         }

00019         {
00020         }

00022         public void Stop()
00023         {
00024         }

00026         public bool Poll(int microSeconds, SelectMode mode)
00027         {
00028             fd_set readFDs = null;
00029             fd_set writeFDs = null;
00030 
00031             if (mode == SelectMode.SelectRead)
00032             {
00033                 readFDs = new fd_set();
00034                 readFDs.FD_ZERO();
00035                 readFDs.FD_SET(mSocket);
00036             }
00037             if (mode == SelectMode.SelectWrite)
00038             {
00039                 writeFDs = new fd_set();
00040                 writeFDs.FD_ZERO();
00041                 writeFDs.FD_SET(mSocket);
00042             }
00043 
00044             Int32 ret = select(0, readFDs, null, null, null);
00045 
00046             Console.WriteLine("select returned: {0}", ret);
00047 
00048             if (readFDs.FD_ISSET(mSocket))
00049             {
00050                 return true;
00051             }
00052             return false;
00053         }
00054 
00055         private delegate bool AsyncPollCaller(int microSeconds, SelectMode mode);
00056 
00057         private void AsyncPollCallback(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
00058         {
00059         }
00060 
00061         public IAsyncResult BeginPoll(int microSeconds,
00062             SelectMode mode,
00063             AsyncCallback callback)
00064         {
00065             AsyncPollCaller caller = new AsyncPollCaller(Poll);
00066             //AsyncCallback cb = new AsyncCallback(AsyncPollCallback);
00067 
00068             IAsyncResult result = caller.BeginInvoke(microSeconds, mode, callback, caller);
00069 
00070             return result;
00071         }
00072 
00073         public bool EndPoll(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
00074         {
00075             AsyncPollCaller caller = (AsyncPollCaller)asyncResult.AsyncState;
00076 
00077             return caller.EndInvoke(asyncResult);
00078         }
00079 
00080         /* unmanaged stuff */
00081         [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]
00082         private unsafe class fd_set
00083         {
00084             public UInt32 fd_count;
00085             [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValArray, SizeConst = 64)]
00086             public Int32[] fd_array;
00087 
00088             public fd_set()
00089             {
00090                 fd_array = new Int32[64];
00091             }
00092 
00093             public void FD_ZERO()
00094             {
00095                 fd_count = 0;
00096             }
00097             public void FD_SET(Int32 fd)
00098             {
00099                 int i;
00100                 for (i = 0; i < fd_count; i++)
00101                 {
00102                     if (fd_array[i] == fd) break;
00103                 }
00104                 if (i == fd_count)
00105                 {
00106                     fd_array[i] = fd;
00107                     fd_count++;
00108                 }
00109             }
00110             public void FD_CLR(Int32 fd)
00111             {
00112                 int i;
00113                 for (i = 0; i < fd_count; i++)
00114                 {
00115                     if (fd_array[i] == fd)
00116                     {
00117                         while (i < (fd_count - 1))
00118                         {
00119                             fd_array[i] = fd_array[i + 1];
00120                             i++;
00121                         }
00122                         fd_count--;
00123                         break;
00124                     }
00125                 }
00126             }
00127             public bool FD_ISSET(Int32 fd)
00128             {
00129                 return (__WSAFDIsSet(fd, this) != 0);
00130             }
00131         }
00132 
00133         private unsafe class timeval {
00134             public Int32 tv_sec;
00135             public Int32 tv_usec;
00136         }
00137         
00138         [DllImport("Ws2_32.dll")]
00139         private static extern Int32 __WSAFDIsSet(Int32 fd, fd_set set);
